text.name: Ring of Scorching
text.description:
{Ring of Scorching}

Worn on a finger, this item causes your Fire spells to inflict an additional 25% damage.
text.event: You take a rest under a large rock and notice something lying in the shade. It's a skeleton's arm wearing a strange ring on one of its charred fingers. The owner won't need it in the afterlife, so you put it in your pocket.
